headline.main: GREEN GERMAN TROOPS GO TO EASTERN FRONT; Many Sent to Fight Russians Have Only 8 Weeks' Training

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, April 1 -- German recruits now moved to the front for the much-heralded Spring offensive received only eight weeks' training, reports the Berlin correspondent of Nya Dagligt Allehanda.
abstract: German troops sent to front after only few wks training
snippet: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, April 1 -- German recruits now moved to the front for the much-heralded Spring offensive received only eight weeks' training, reports the Berlin correspondent of Nya Dagligt Allehanda....

byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
